name: Puppies 3D
description:
Bond and interact with a family of the most adorable puppies in a lifelike, 3D world, and choose from the most popular breeds. Adopt your very own puppies, take care of them, play with them, exercise with them, train them, and socialize, all in an incredibly realistic and interactive three-dimensional environment! Puppies 3D will fully transport you to a puppy-loving town with interesting townsfolk to interact with.

- Adopt and care for 12 of the most popular dog breeds.
- Interact and train your virtual dogs as if they were real pets.
- Explore a village full of discovery with people and other dogs.
